timeline.message:
Allow addMediaPackage to Accept ACLs

This patch allows the single request ingest to accept access control
lists:

    curl http://localhost:8080/ingest/addMediaPackage/fast \
      -u admin:opencast \
      -F 'flavor=presentation/source' \
      -F 'BODY=@sintel_trailer-1080p.mp4' \
      -F title=test \
      -F acl='{"acl": {"ace": [
          {"allow": true,"role": "ROLE_ADMIN","action": "read"},
          {"allow": true,"role": "ROLE_ADMIN","action": "write"},
          {"allow": true,"role": "ROLE_USER","action": "read"}]}}'
